alert.note: Alert for Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:04AM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR EASTERN PHELPS...NORTHWESTERN KEARNEY AND SOUTHWESTERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 1202 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, or 9 miles southwest of Kearney, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kearney, Minden, , Axtell, Odessa, and Funk. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 283. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
